name: Raheema Hotel
address: Cumaratunga Munidasa Mawatha, Colombo, Sri Lanka

tip: They now deliver for just Rs. 50 as a delivery cost
review:
If you're in Colombo 7 and you're craving a good biriyani, Raheema is one of the first places that will come to mind. That's exactly the situation we found ourselves in, and we're glad we dropped in.
While Raheema's is rather humble by the standards of Colpetty eateries, the workaday downstairs is clean and, at lunch time, typically full of people digging their fingers into steaming bowls of biryani.
